document_data.name: Ekaa Arrow
document_data.mainbody: An '''ekaa''' was a type of [[arrow]] used by [[Angulutiun]] and [[Iulutiun]] hunters
document_data.Description: An ekaa was a specialized arrow utilized for hunting [[caribou]] and other herd animals. The arrowhead, expertly crafted from the antlers of caribou or [[deer]], was affixed to a bone shaft. Both the arrowhead and shaft were adorned were covered with hooked barbs for enhanced efficacy.
document_data.Uses: These arrows were used primarily to hunt caribou and deer.
document_data.Availability: Though relatively rare outside of the [[Great Glacier]], six elkaa arrows could be purchased for 3 [[sp]].
